google_play_reviews.content: Upgraded to pro a few years back With recent upgrade to the app I no longer have pro despite app saying pro last forever BEWARE. I contacted developer and still no response Edit: I have emailed the app developer three times prior and just sent another email today after seeing the reply. Will update review accordingly Edit 2: 1 month later still no reply. Avoid this app and upgrading to pro at all cost. Edit 3: 9/17/21 2 months later still no reply.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cobalt Phone! I'm really sorry you are having issues with the pro version. I don't remember seeing an email from you, but no worries. Could you please send me another email to evilsushipirate@gmail.com with your Google/Android username that you used to purchase the pro version and I will get this resolved for you.

google_play_reviews.content: App is buggy and doesn't maintain app states properly, but that's no big deal for an app as simple as this. I wish the anti-churn rules had Citi. There are also numerous cards and loyalty programs missing, e.g. Turkish Airlines Miles&Smiles and Citi Custom Cash. Other than that, this app is a good way to keep track of your cards without having to log in to anything or to risk your data being sold.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Hamilton, thank you for your feedback! I totally agree that there are tons of things missing from the app and I am constantly getting emails request to add various things which I am trying to keep up with. I am really curious about what bugs you are seeing though! Could you send me an email (evilsushipirate@gmail.com) with more details? Thanks!

google_play_reviews.content: Pro Purchase/Upgrade has disappeared with this update and all existing data has gone. What a rubbish app and greedy dev.
Hi, newbie here. Just downloaded the app but I like it so far. I'm guessing we enter the points manually each month. Could you please add the Total Rewards card. Thanks.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rosa! I'm glad you like the app! Yes, the points get manually added. I will add the Total Rewards card during the next update :)
